Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:59:04

Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CBMN0XT_00
From: New Shield Insurance Brokers LLC <ts3@nsib.ae>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-01 13:47
Subject: Your Insurance Channel Partner
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


 

 

Hi there,

Trust this email finds you well. We at NSIB would like to express our gratitude for giving us the opportunity to quote for your insurance requirement earlier, We now request you to give us an opportunity to quote once again this year.

We are an Insurance Authority Licensed and UAE Regulatory body’s directive No: 15 (2014) complied company. We   are committed to providing comprehensive solutions to address various risks, by offering consultancy services for all classes of insurance products under one roof, including motor, medical, group life & personal accident, property& miscellaneous insurance.

We are an Insurance Authority Licensed and UAE Regulatory body’s directive No: 15 (2014) complied company. We   are committed to providing comprehensive solutions to address various risks, by offering consultancy services for all classes of insurance products under one roof, including motor, medical, group life & personal accident, property& miscellaneous insurance. 

New Shield Insurance believes and upholds its commitment to clients and assures you of providing our exceptional insurance solutions and personalized service. The convenience of having all insurance products and services available under one roof is undoubtedly appealing to businesses seeking comprehensive coverage. Our dedication to understanding each client's unique risks and requirements is a significant advantage. By taking the time to assess and analyze these factors, our experienced advisors can provide tailored solutions that offer the most effective protection for each business. 

NSIB's offer of being a one-stop shop for insurance, combined with its commitment to understanding and addressing clients' unique risks, makes it an attractive option for businesses seeking reliable insurance coverage. We hold the ability to negotiate coverage with top business insurance carriers making NSIB the trusted partner for businesses seeking comprehensive and affordable insurance solutions.

We invite you to explore NSIB's products and services by viewing the brochure and our strength in the video attached in this email.

Our representative will call you, to discuss further or you can reach out to us on 0545818009

We invite you to explore NSIB's products and services by viewing the brochure and our strength in the video attached in this email.

Our representative will call you, to discuss further or you can reach out to us on 0545818009

Once again, please remember that we are here for you and your needs remain important to us. 

 

 

Thanks & Regards,
